channel.title: How to make items NOT drop?
channel.description: Yeah, I want to make certain donor items and the fire cape not drop in my server. How do I do this?

item.title: How to make items NOT drop?
item.dc:creator: @drakenparel drakenparel
item.description:
@drakenparel wrote:

Im sorry for replying to and old topic,
but i think its better then posting a new thread.

I would like to know that answer to.

Delta source.

I mean i made my donator items untradeable but i cant find a way to make them not drop.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make items NOT drop?

item.title: How to make items NOT drop?
item.dc:creator: @The_Disciple The Disciple
item.description:
@The_Disciple wrote:

No, what I meant was being dropped by players. So if someone had a fire cape and they died PKing, they would still keep it.

Read full topic
